      • onSurfaceCreated

        public void onSurfaceCreated(EGLConfig config)
        Creates the buffers we use to store information about the 3D world. OpenGL doesn't use Java arrays, but rather needs data in a format it can understand. Hence we use ByteBuffers.
        Parameters:
        config - The EGL configuration used when creating the surface.

      • onNewFrame

        public void onNewFrame(com.google.vrtoolkit.cardboard.HeadTransform headTransform)
        Prepares OpenGL ES before we draw a frame.
        Parameters:
        headTransform - The head transformation in the new frame.

      • init

        protected void init(org.ros.node.NodeMainExecutor nodeMainExecutor)
        Description copied from class: RosCardboardActivity
        This method is called in a background thread once this Activity has been initialized with a master URI via the MasterChooser and a NodeMainExecutorService has started. Your NodeMains should be started here using the provided NodeMainExecutor.
        Specified by:
        init in class RosCardboardActivity
        Parameters:
        nodeMainExecutor - the NodeMainExecutor created for this Activity
